attributes.action: Prevent Donald Trump from addressing Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
For example many women have died in coutries where abortion is not permitted because they couldnt have a dead phoetus removed. These are needless deaths.  
Donald Trump needs some kind of signal from the UK that these abuses of human rights are unacceptable particularly as he is president of America with influence over so many other countries.
attributes.background: Donald Trump has discriminated against Muslims with his travel ban. He has also begun to curtail womens rights by withdrawing funding for charities who support termination of pregnancies.
